response:
Young adult with unilateral optic neuropathy most likely has inflammatory demyelinating optic neuritis; antibody-mediated (MOGAD/NMOSD) and compressive, ischaemic, infectious, and infiltrative causes must be excluded.

differential_diagnosis = ["Demyelinating optic neuritis (multiple sclerosis\u2013associated)", "MOG antibody\u2013associated optic neuritis", "Aquaporin-4 NMOSD optic neuritis", "Compressive optic neuropathy of the left optic nerve", "Non-arteritic anterior ischaemic optic neuropathy", "Sarcoid optic neuropathy", "Syphilitic optic neuritis", "Leber hereditary optic neuropathy", "Toxic-nutritional optic neuropathy"]
